page.title: 14Village Life (cont)
page.content: {2.The Women's Institute.(W.I.) The W.I. in Castle Camps has been running for over 30 years.It organises fetes and the annual Pancake Race, run in the High Street each year. This attracts lots of people from other villages. There are also races for children. This is a popular event held every Shrove Tuesday.The W.I. discuss things in the village.They have already thought about the stalls in the village fete.They arrange trips to places of interest and often raise money for good causes.
